abilities.name: Dwarven Resilience.
abilities.description: Augrek has advantage on saving throws against poison.

abilities.name: Roleplaying Information.
abilities.description:
Sheriff's Ddeputy Augrek guards the southwest gate of BRyn Shander and welcomes visitors to town. She has a good heart.
Ideal: "You'll get farther in life with a kind word than an axe"
Bond: "Bryn Shander is my home. It's my job to protect her."
Flaw: "I'm head over heels in love with Sheriff Southwell. One day I hope to marry him."
